tail.name: abdomen
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A bump starts to grow above [npc.her] ass which begins to expand gradually until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.she] look at [npc.her] new appendage and see a [npc.materialDescriptor] abdomen that is tapered at the end with a stinger at the end which [npc.she] [npc.verb(guess)] can produce and inject poison.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldYellow(feron abdomen)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] bumps starts to grow above [npc.her] ass they begin to expand gradually until there about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.she] look at [ncp.her] new appendages and see [npc.materialDescriptor] abdomens that are tapered at the end with a stingers at the end each which [ncp.she] [npc.verb(guess)] can produce and inject poison.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldYellow(feron abdomens)], [npc.materialDescriptor] #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: protruding out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] feron abdomen, which pulsates with [npc.her] heart beat. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] feron abdomens, which pulsates with [npc.her] heart beat. #ENDIF
